All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    AESSuite
    AESSuite is a symmetric encryption suite.
    CamberClient
    The console-based client for Camber.
    CamberServer
    The server for Camber.
    CamberStressTester
    CamberStressTester is a stress tester for the server.
    ChatMap
    ChatMap stores program constants that aren't defined in the user configuration.
    Client
    Client handles the client side of the connection and provides functions for basic application features such as sending and getting messages, switching and getting topics, and closing the connection.
    Format
    Format provides functions related to string checking and sanitization.
    Group
    Group is initialized with a name and password (which it then hashes) and contains a cache of recent messages.
    Log  
    Message
    Message represents a message sent by a user.
    Request
    Request represents a container of serializable data to be sent over the network.
    Request.Types  
    RSASuite
    RSAsuite is an asymmetric encryption suite.
    Server
    Server accepts client connections and manages the data sent and received by individual server threads.
    ServerData
    Server passes an instance of ServerData to each ServerThread upon its instantiation.
    ServerThread
    ServerThread is a state machine that handles a single client connection and syncs with the ServerData it is instantiated with.
    ServerThread.States  
    SHAutil
    A class providing a one-off to get the SHA-256 hash of a String in hex form
